nodes.name: MarketShare

nodes.documentation: @dev records a sale from a seller
nodes.name: recordSales

nodes.documentation: @return the number of sales records coming from different seller addresses
nodes.name: getNbSales

nodes.documentation: @return the total amount of sales records currently being recorded
nodes.name: getTotalSales

nodes.documentation: @return the sales record currently associated to a particular seller address
nodes.name: getSales
MarketShare

nodes.documentation: @dev records a sale from a seller
nodes.name: recordSales

nodes.documentation: @return the number of sales records coming from different seller addresses
nodes.name: getNbSales

nodes.documentation: @return the total amount of sales records currently being recorded
nodes.name: getTotalSales

nodes.documentation: @return the sales record currently associated to a particular seller address
nodes.name: getSales

getNbSales().return: the number of sales records coming from different seller addresses

getNbSellers().return: the total number number of currently listed sellers

getSales(address).return: the sales record currently associated to a particular seller address

getTotalSales().return: the total amount of sales records currently being recorded

isSeller(address).return: if a given address corresponds to a listed seller

recordSales(int256).details: records a sale from a seller

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
